thread.title: Urban Chestnut expands distribution deal with Major Brands
thread.title_full: Urban Chestnut expands distribution deal with Major Brands

author: Diana Barr
title: Urban Chestnut expands distribution deal with Major Brands

organizations.name: st. louis business journal share diana barr associate editor st. louis business journal home

text: Urban Chestnut expands distribution deal with Major Brands Feb 21, 2017, 6:52am CST Industries & Tags Diana Barr Associate Editor St. Louis Business Journal Share Diana Barr Associate Editor St. Louis Business Journal Home of the Day Enlarge Urban Chestnut Brewery Co.'s location on Manchester in The Grove. Urban Chestnut Brewing Co. has signed on with Major Brands , one of St. Louis' largest privately held companies, to provide the craft brewer with distribution services in the city of St. Louis beginning March 1. Terms of the deal weren't disclosed. Urban Chestnut previously handled its own distribution in the city. Enlarge Urban Chestnut Brewery Co.'s location on Manchester in The Grove. Officials with the companies said Monday that Major Brands will distribute Urban Chestnut's entire portfolio in the city of St. Louis as well as continuing to represent it in St. Charles and in Kansas City, where Major Brands introduced Urban Chestnut two years ago. "This is a great opportunity for two companies with shared values and a desire to help the city join forces to build both our businesses and the community at the same time," Major Brands CEO Sue McCollum said in a statement. "We are honored to work with Urban Chestnut in the city and look forward to doing great things together.” David Wolfe , Urban Chestnut’s co-founder, said of Major Brands, “We are thrilled to enter into this agreement and work with them to increase our current distribution capabilities in the city of St. Louis as well as maintain the great partnerships with our current retail customers.” Major Brands, a distributor of wine, spirits, beer and nonalcoholic beverages, reported 2015 revenue of $390 million . In addition to its St. Louis headquarters, it has offices in Kansas City, Springfield, Columbia and Cape Girardeau, Missouri. Urban Chestnut operates three breweries in St. Louis: Midtown Brewery & Biergarten at 3229 Washington Ave., Grove Brewerey & Bierhall at 4465 Manchester and the U.R.B. (Urban Research Brewery) at 4501 Manchester. The company's fourth brewery, Urban Chestnut Hallertauer Brauerei, is in the Hallertau region of Bavaria. Home of the Day
